mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_project_mst( proj_name, proj_code, proj_description, start_date, end_date, reg_id, update_id ) VALUES ( #{proj_name}, #{proj_code}, #{proj_description}, #{start_date}, #{end_date}, #{reg_id}, #{update_id} );
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_project_mst SET proj_name=#{project.proj_name}, proj_code=#{project.proj_code}, proj_description=#{project.proj_description}, start_date=#{project.start_date}, end_date=#{project.end_date} WHERE proj_id = #{id}
